title: Tie Breaking Procedures links to external page
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Tie Breaking Procedures" link
custom_expected: THEN the external Tie Breaking Procedures page is displayed (http://m.mlb.com/news/article/59527184/playoff-tiebreaker-rules/)

title: Standings page should be available with all 30 teams pages
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads Standings page for favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN user loads https://www.mlb.com/dodgers/standings
custom_expected:
THEN
1. the Standings page should load with selected team header and footer
2. Requested team should have highlighted row

title: Clicking on "Regular Season" filter displays regular season standings
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Regular Season" filter
custom_expected: THEN the data tables display regular season standings

title: Clicking on "Wild Card" filter displays wild card standings
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Wild Card" filter
AND the season is 1995 or later
custom_expected: THEN the data tables display wild card standings

title: Clicking on "Spring Training" filter displays spring training standings
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Spring Training" filter
AND the season is 2016 or later
custom_expected: THEN the data tables display spring training standings

title: Clicking on "Postseason Projections" links to external page
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Postseason Projections" filter
AND the season is 2012 or later
custom_expected: THEN the external Postseason Projections page is displayed (http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/probability.jsp)

title: "Year" filter displays 1901 - Current
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Year" filter
custom_expected: THEN seasons between 1901 - Current are available for selection

title: Standings "Type" filter displays Division/League/MLB based on season
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Type" filter
custom_expected:
THEN the standings data table can be viewed by Division/League/MLB
-1969 and later - Division/League/MLB are available
-1968 and earlier - League/MLB are available

title: "Splits" filter displays Standard/Advanced
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Splits" filter
custom_expected: THEN the data table will reflect Standard or Advanced data based on selection

title: Standings "Split Season" filter displays First Half/Second Half/Overall
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Split Season" filter
AND a split season has been selected (1981)
custom_expected: THEN the data tables display First Half, Second Half or Overall standings data

title: Date picker allows selection of date bounded by season start/end
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Date Picker"
custom_expected:
THEN only dates within the current season period (Regular Season, Wild Card) start and end can be selected
AND standings data will update with each date change

title: Date picker does not allow year selection; only displays current
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Date Picker"
custom_expected:
THEN the currently selected year is displayed
AND you cannot change the year from the date picker

title: Header logo/label displayed for Division/League views
custom_steps: WHEN viewing Division/League standings
custom_expected: THEN an American League and National League logo/label is displayed above the table

title: Legend displays when a key value is in data
custom_steps: WHEN data exists for W, X, Y, Z standings positions
custom_expected: THEN a legend displaying the key value/label displays under the tables

title: "W" displays in table/legend
custom_steps: WHEN a team has clinched a wild card position
custom_expected:
THEN a "W" displays next to the Club in the table
AND the legend displays "W = Clinched Wild Card."

title: "X" displays in table/legend
custom_steps: WHEN a team has clinched a playoff berth
custom_expected:
THEN a "X" displays next to the Club in the table
AND the legend displays "X = Clinched Playoff Berth."

title: "Y" displays in table/legend
custom_steps: WHEN a team has clinched a division
custom_expected:
THEN a "Y" displays next to the Club in the table
AND the legend displays "Y = Clinched Division."

title: "Z" displays in table/legend
custom_steps: WHEN a team has clinched the division and has the best record in the league
custom_expected:
THEN a "Z" displays next to the Club in the table
AND the legend displays "Z = Clinched Division and Best Record in League."

title: DIFF - column displays positive, flat, negative colors for Run DIFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads mlb.com/standings and teams have Run DIFF stat
custom_steps: WHEN user views Run DIFF value for team in Regular Season, Wild Card, or Spring Training season types
custom_expected:
THEN
1. Team has positive Run DIFF: color equals green
2. Team has flat (0) Run DIFF: color equals black
3. Team has negative Run DIFF: color equals red

title: Page should pull current data info from API
custom_steps: WHEN user loads Standings page
custom_expected:
THEN page should pull API call for requested date with all data information

ex: https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/standings?leagueId=103,104&season=2018&date=2018-10-01&standingsTypes=regularSeason,springTraining,firstHalf,secondHalf&hydrate=division,conference,sport,league,team(nextSchedule(team,gameType=[R,F,D,L,W,C],inclusive=false),previousSchedule(team,gameType=[R,F,D,L,W,C],inclusive=true))

title: Team Logos should display in XL viewports from year 2017 - current year
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads standings page from year 2017 to current
custom_steps: WHEN user loads standings page from year 2017 to current
custom_expected: THEN team logos should appear to the left of the team name

title: PCT column should be highlighted
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user loads the standings page
custom_steps: WHEN user views the standings table
custom_expected: THEN the PCT column should always be highlighted

title: Ranking - Teams should be sorted by PCT
custom_steps: WHEN user views Standings table
custom_expected: THEN Teams should be sorted by PCT

title: Ranking - Teams with tied PCT should be ranked by record vs. team
custom_preconds: GIVEN team is tied with another team via Winning PCT
custom_steps: WHEN teams are ranked with tied PCT
custom_expected: THEN the team with the better Win/Loss record vs. that tied team, should be ranked higher

title: Next Game column should allow room for multiple teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Wild Card game and possible next opponent can be 2 teams
custom_steps: WHEN WC game is being played and each team has Next Game show 2 possible opponents
custom_expected: THEN Next Game column should be able to fit 2 possible opponents

title: EDGE - Tiebreaker games data should appear
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are Tiebreaker games to determine MLB Postseason teams
custom_steps: WHEN user views Standings table
custom_expected: THEN Tiebreaker data (game 163) should appear on the data tables

title: EDGE - Datepicker should extend season for the Tiebreaker games
custom_preconds: GIVEN Tiebreaker games need to be played in order to determine MLB Postseason
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Standings page
custom_expected: THEN the Datepicker should extend beyond the Regular Season to accommodate for Tiebreaker game (game 163)

title: L/XL - 728x90 ads are displayed
custom_steps: WHEN viewing at a viewport between 1024+
custom_expected: THEN a 728x90 ad is displayed in the header/between tables

title: M - 728x90 ads are displayed
custom_steps: WHEN viewing at a viewport between 768-1023
custom_expected: THEN a 728x90 ad is displayed in the header/between tables

title: XS/S - 320x50 ads are displayed
custom_steps: WHEN viewing at a viewport between 320-767
custom_expected: THEN a 320x50 ad is displayed in the header/between tables

title: Confirm "top-level" URLs resolve successfully
custom_preconds: GIVEN a URL is directly navigated to
custom_steps:
WHEN the following URLs are entered into the browser:
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/standings/
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/es/standings/
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/dodgers/standings/
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/es/dodgers/standings/
custom_expected:
THEN the URL will resolve successfully
AND display expected language
AND display the expected styling

THEN the URL will resolve successfully
AND display expected language
AND display the expected styling

title: Confirm "wild card" URLs resolve successfully
Confirm "advanced split" URLs resolve successfully
Confirm "spring training" URLs resolve successfully
Choosing 1981 year displays "Overall Standings" dropdown as default
custom_steps: WHEN selecting the 1981 season
custom_expected:
THEN an additional dropdown displays to the right of year
AND the dropdown defaults to "Overall Standings."

title: The "Split Season" type dropdown contains "Overall Standings, First Half, Second Half" options
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting the 1981 season
AND viewing the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the options "Overall Standings, First Half, Second Half" are displayed

title: "Overall Standings" displays season standings as of 10/05/81
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting the 1981 season
AND the "Overall Standings" filter
custom_expected: THEN standings for the full season through 10/05/81 are displayed in the table

title: Choosing "First Half" displays standings as of 06/11/81
Choosing "Second Half" displays standings as of 10/05/81
